meaningMnemonic: There are people under a <radical>canopy</radical> on the <radical>street</radical> forming their own <kanji>agency</kanji>. They're banding together right here in the street, making a new <kanji>government office</kanji>!
readingMnemonic:
This new <kanji>agency</kanji> is just starting to make progress when you hear a low rumble... then a screech.

"THIS IS MY STREET. NO NEW AGENCIES ON MY STREET!" Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) cries as she barrels into everyone.
